resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Get All Categories
options.description: Return a list of categories within a forum
options.action: Get all categories in a forum

options.name: Get All Threads
options.description: Return a list of threads within a forum
options.action: Get all threads in a forum

options.name: Get All Posts
options.description: Return a list of posts within a forum
options.action: Get all posts in a forum

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

id.name: id
id.description: The short name(aka ID) of the forum to get Threads
id.ai_hint: The short name(aka ID) of the forum to get Threads

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: related
options.description: You may specify relations to include with your response

options.name: include
options.description: You may specify relations to include with your response

options.name: order
options.description: You may specify order to sort your response

options.name: thread
options.description: Looks up a thread by ID. You may pass us the "ident" query type instead of an ID by including "forum". You may pass us the "link" query type to filter by URL. You must pass the "forum" if you do not have the Pro API Access addon.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

conditional_rules: IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'forum' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'forum' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'getPosts' AND resource == 'forum' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'forum' AND operation == 'getPosts' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'forum' AND operation == 'getPosts' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getPosts' AND resource == 'forum' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'getCategories' AND resource == 'forum' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'forum' AND operation == 'getCategories' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'forum' AND operation == 'getCategories' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getCategories' AND resource == 'forum' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'getThreads' AND resource == 'forum' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'forum' AND operation == 'getThreads' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'forum' AND operation == 'getThreads' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getThreads' AND resource == 'forum' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
